New Records: Dasun Shanaka scored the fastest fifty by a Sri Lankan batsman in the T20 format with 56 off 22 balls
Key Match Events: Dasun Shanaka's unbeaten 56 off 22 balls set up Sri Lanka's victory
Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav's 91-run sixth-wicket stand threatened India's win
Kasun Rajitha's two wickets in the second over of the Indian reply helped Sri Lanka restrict India
Umran Malik took 3 wickets for 48 runs for India
Arshdeep Singh bowled 5 no-balls in the innings
Post-Match Reflections: Dasun Shanaka was named man of the match for his all-round show
India skipper Hardik Pandya expressed disappointment at Arshdeep Singh's no-balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka levelled the T20 series against India
The series is now tied 1-1 and will go into the decider on Saturday in Rajkot
